page.title: 02Local area II
page.content:
Just inside the boundary of the London Boro' of Havering is Havering atte Bower from which the Borough gets its name.Pupils from Forest Lodge have studied this village and accounts of these may be found in the text.
Bedford's Park in the S.E. corner of our area has been of interest to the Britisn Trust for Conservation and volunteers have undertaken a programme of footpath maintenance,pond clearing and tree planting.
During 1984 Forest Lodge School was involved in a tree planting scheme on the edge of the school grounds.Despite the work of vandals rowan,sycamore and oak trees have survived.
